alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 11 at 2:14AM MST until November 12 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MST THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne. * WHEN...8 AM MST this morning until 8 AM MST Sunday. There will be potential for occasional gusts near 60 MPH late this morning and early afternoon. However, the strongest winds are generally expected during this evening and overnight into early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
